Posts.Content: Shiconia wrote: So lets go over this, i am 17, in school, in university prep courses and my life was looking pretty great. i have known that my mother has been "ill" for some time now, i just shurged it off as being nothing, but i am a person that get concerned (eventually). so i asked her last night alone in private and she said don't worry about it, i went on and on about it and she eventually got pretty annoyed so i asked her what tests have been done, she replied "blood,urine,cat scan,ultrasound and mri " i said alright thanks. tonight while I'm doing a paper she comes in and tells me that she MAY have breast cancer, i said I'm glad i know. quite honestly i am scared as hell, she has lupus, and she is quite balanced with that, she has had it for over 15 years and is perfectly fine, i don't know human science though so i am scared lupus may have an inpact on the cancer. as far as the cancer goes she said there is a lump, so the MAYÂ  is a decent chance of "is", the last time i cried alone was when i was very young when i taught i was going to die when i has holding on for dear life on a bridge when i was 10. Im not sure what to do, I'm scared, alone, and crying as i finish up this letter. no one in the entire world means as much to me as her, not my father,sister,girlfriend and all my friends COMBINED matches as much as i care for her. so yeah thats about it, and Hi. hi is good. Shiconia Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hello to all, heres the deal. Shiconia Dukemom2
